description.en:
She would have to marry the son of another organization?!

Yang Hye-jin had completely cut ties with her family right after she entered college, in pursuit of peaceful a daily life. It has been nine years since she left her violent father and her ignorant brother, who resembled him. However, her family suddenly appears and unilaterally announces her marriage with an unwanted partner, Moo Kang. Can Hye-jin and Moo Kang swear their entire lives in this marriage, which consists of a contract between organizations, and where death is the only path should they do not accept it?

---
The Yang and Kim families were once rival gangs with construction company fronts that spilled blood over a smidgen of gold. But a new company has entered the picture, and now both their stakes are at risk. Reluctantly, they form an alliance… sealed with an arranged marriage between their children, Hyejin and Moogahng! However, Hyejin’s past traumas keep her heart guarded, and Moogahng shrouds himself in mystery. It doesn’t seem like any amount of blood, tears, or gold will make their marriage better. But can love make this troubled pair work?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A3%BD%EC%9D%8C-%EB%8C%80%EC%8B%A0-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC/2784), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57997072)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/before-death-do-us-part)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
description.id:
Dia harus menikahi anak lelaki dari organisasi lain?! Yang Hye-jin telah benar-benar memutuskan hubungan dengan keluarganya setelah dia masuk perguruan tinggi, untuk mengejar kehidupan sehari-hari yang damai. Sudah sembilan tahun sejak dia meninggalkan ayahnya yang kejam dan saudara laki yang bodoh, yang mirip dengannya. Namun, keluarganya tiba-tiba muncul dan secara sepihak mengumumkan pernikahannya dengan pasangan yang tidak diinginkan, Moo Kang. Bisakah Hye-jin dan Moo Kang bersumpah seumur hidup mereka dalam pernikahan ini, yang terdiri dari kontrak antar organisasi, dan di mana kematian adalah satu-satunya jalan jika mereka tidak menerimanya?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A3%BD%EC%9D%8C-%EB%8C%80%EC%8B%A0-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC/2784), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57997072)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/before-death-do-us-part)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
description.ko:
다른 조직의 아들과 계약 결혼을 해야 한다고?! 평온한 일상을 위해 대학 입학 후 싸움만 일삼는 집안과는 연을 완전히 끊고 바르게 살아가고 있는 아가씨, 양혜진. 손부터 먼저 나가는 폭력적인 아버지와 그를 똑 닮은 무식한 오빠를 떠난 지도 9년째, 하지만 가족들은 갑자기 나타나 원하지도 않는 상대 무강과의 결혼을 일방적으로 알린다. 조직 간의 계약으로 이루어진 정략 결혼, 받아들이지 않으면 죽음 뿐인 이 결혼에서 과연 혜진과 무강은 평생을 맹세할 수 있을까?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A3%BD%EC%9D%8C-%EB%8C%80%EC%8B%A0-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC/2784), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57997072)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/before-death-do-us-part)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
description.pt-br:
Ela teria que se casar com o filho de outra organização ?! Yang Hye-jin cortou completamente os laços com sua família logo depois que ela entrou na faculdade, em busca de uma vida diária pacífica. Passaram-se nove anos desde que ela deixou seu pai violento e seu irmão ignorante, que se parecia com ele. No entanto, sua família aparece de repente e anuncia unilateralmente seu casamento com um parceiro indesejado, Moo Kang. Hye-jin e Moo Kang podem jurar suas vidas inteiras neste casamento, que consiste em um contrato entre organizações, e onde a morte é o único caminho que eles deveriam não aceitar?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A3%BD%EC%9D%8C-%EB%8C%80%EC%8B%A0-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC/2784), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57997072)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/before-death-do-us-part)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
description.ru:
Ей придется выйти замуж за сына другой организации ?!

Ян Хе Джин полностью порвала связи со своей семьей сразу после поступления в колледж в погоне за мирной повседневной жизнью.

Прошло девять лет с тех пор, как она оставила своего жестокого отца и своего невежественного брата, который был похож на него.

Однако внезапно объявляется ее семья и объявляется ее браке нежелательным партнером Му Каном.

Могут ли Хе Джин и Му Кан поклясться всю свою жизнь в этом браке, который состоит из контракта между организациями, отказавшись от которого вознаградит смертью?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A3%BD%EC%9D%8C-%EB%8C%80%EC%8B%A0-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC/2784), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57997072)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/before-death-do-us-part)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
